verses.verse: Now the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Tell <S%H1696><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to turn <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> and camp <S%H2583><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pi-hahiroth, between <S%H996><s%> Migdol <S%H4024><s%> and the sea; <S%H3220><s%> you shall camp <S%H2583><s%> in front <S%H6440><s%> of Baal-zephon, opposite <S%H5227><s%> it, by the sea. <S%H3220><s%>

"For Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> will say <S%H559><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> 'They are wandering <S%H943><s%> aimlessly <S%H943><s%> in the land; <S%H776><s%> the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> has shut <S%H5462><s%> them in.'

"Thus I will harden <S%H2388><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s heart, <S%H3820><s%> and he will chase <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them; and I will be honored <S%H3513><s%> through Pharaoh and all <S%H3605><s%> his army, <S%H2428><s%> and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>" And they did <S%H6213><s%> so. <S%H3651><s%>

When the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> was told <S%H5046><s%> that the people <S%H5971><s%> had fled, <S%H1272><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and his servants <S%H5650><s%> had <S%H2015><s%> a change <S%H2015><s%> of heart <S%H3824><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> and they said, <S%H559><s%> "What <S%H4100><s%> is this <S%H2088><s%> we have done, <S%H6213><s%> that we have let <S%H7971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> go <S%H7971><s%> from serving <S%H5647><s%> us?"
So he made <S%H631><s%> his chariot <S%H7393><s%> ready <S%H631><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> with him;

and he took <S%H3947><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> select <S%H977><s%> chariots, <S%H7393><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the [other] chariots <S%H7393><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with officers <S%H7991><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> hardened <S%H2388><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and he chased <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> as the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were going <S%H3318><s%> out boldly. <S%H7311><s%> <S%H3027><s%>

Then the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> chased <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them [with] all <S%H3605><s%> the horses <S%H5483><s%> [and] chariots <S%H7393><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> his horsemen <S%H6571><s%> and his army, <S%H2428><s%> and they overtook <S%H5381><s%> them camping <S%H2583><s%> by the sea, <S%H3220><s%> beside <S%H5921><s%> Pi-hahiroth, in front <S%H6440><s%> of Baal-zephon.

And as Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> drew <S%H7126><s%> near, <S%H7126><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> looked, <S%H5375><s%> <S%H5869><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> were marching <S%H5265><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them, and they became <S%H3372><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> frightened; <S%H3372><s%> so the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> cried <S%H6817><s%> out to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

Then they said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Is it because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1097><s%> there <S%H369><s%> were no <S%H369><s%> graves <S%H6913><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> that you have taken <S%H3947><s%> us away to die <S%H4191><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>? Why <S%H4100><s%> have you dealt <S%H6213><s%> with us in this <S%H2088><s%> way, <S%H2088><s%> bringing <S%H3318><s%> us out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>?

"Is this <S%H2088><s%> not the word <S%H1697><s%> that we spoke <S%H1696><s%> to you in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Leave <S%H2308><s%> us alone <S%H4480><s%> that we may serve <S%H5647><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>'? For it would have been better <S%H2896><s%> for us to serve <S%H5647><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> to die <S%H4191><s%> in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>"

But Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> "Do not fear! <S%H3372><s%> Stand <S%H3320><s%> by and see <S%H7200><s%> the salvation <S%H3444><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He will accomplish <S%H6213><s%> for you today; <S%H3117><s%> for the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> you have seen <S%H7200><s%> today, <S%H3117><s%> you will never <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5750><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> them again <S%H3254><s%> forever. <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%>
"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will fight <S%H3898><s%> for you while you keep <S%H2790><s%> silent. <S%H2790><s%>"

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Why <S%H4100><s%> are you crying <S%H6817><s%> out to Me? Tell <S%H1696><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to go <S%H5265><s%> forward. <S%H5265><s%>

"And as for you, lift <S%H7311><s%> up your staff <S%H4294><s%> and stretch <S%H5186><s%> out your hand <S%H3027><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> and divide <S%H1234><s%> it, and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall go <S%H935><s%> through <S%H935><s%> the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> on dry <S%H3004><s%> land. <S%H3004><s%>

"And as for Me, behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will harden <S%H2388><s%> the hearts <S%H3820><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> so that they will go <S%H935><s%> in after <S%H310><s%> them; and I will be honored <S%H3513><s%> through Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his army, <S%H2428><s%> through his chariots <S%H7393><s%> and his horsemen. <S%H6571><s%>

"Then the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> when I am honored <S%H3513><s%> through Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> through his chariots <S%H7393><s%> and his horsemen. <S%H6571><s%>"

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> who had been going <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> moved <S%H5265><s%> and went <S%H1980><s%> behind <S%H4480><s%> <S%H310><s%> them; and the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of cloud <S%H6051><s%> moved <S%H5265><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> them and stood <S%H5975><s%> behind <S%H4480><s%> <S%H310><s%> them.

So it came <S%H935><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and there was the cloud <S%H6051><s%> along with the darkness, <S%H2822><s%> yet it gave <S%H215><s%> light <S%H215><s%> at night. <S%H3915><s%> Thus the one <S%H2088><s%> did not come <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> the other <S%H2088><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> night. <S%H3915><s%>

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> stretched <S%H5186><s%> out his hand <S%H3027><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the sea; <S%H3220><s%> and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> swept <S%H1980><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> [back] by a strong <S%H5794><s%> east <S%H6921><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> night, <S%H3915><s%> and turned <S%H7760><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> into dry <S%H2724><s%> land, <S%H2724><s%> so the waters <S%H4325><s%> were divided. <S%H1234><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H935><s%> through <S%H935><s%> the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> on the dry <S%H3004><s%> land, <S%H3004><s%> and the waters <S%H4325><s%> [were like] a wall <S%H2346><s%> to them on their right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> and on their left. <S%H8040><s%>

Then the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> took <S%H7291><s%> up the pursuit, <S%H7291><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Pharaoh's horses, <S%H5483><s%> his chariots <S%H7393><s%> and his horsemen <S%H6571><s%> went <S%H935><s%> in after <S%H310><s%> them into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the sea. <S%H3220><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about at the morning <S%H1242><s%> watch, <S%H821><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> looked <S%H8259><s%> down <S%H8259><s%> on the army <S%H4264><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> through the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> and cloud <S%H6051><s%> and brought <S%H2000><s%> the army <S%H4264><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> into confusion. <S%H2000><s%>

And He caused their chariot <S%H4818><s%> wheels <S%H212><s%> to swerve, <S%H5493><s%> and He made them drive <S%H5090><s%> with difficulty; <S%H3517><s%> so the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Let us flee <S%H5127><s%> from Israel, <S%H3478><s%> for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is fighting <S%H3898><s%> for them against the Egyptians. <S%H4714><s%>"

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Stretch <S%H5186><s%> out your hand <S%H3027><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> so that the waters <S%H4325><s%> may come <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> their chariots <S%H7393><s%> and their horsemen. <S%H6571><s%>"

So Moses <S%H4872><s%> stretched <S%H5186><s%> out his hand <S%H3027><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and the sea <S%H3220><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to its normal <S%H386><s%> state <S%H386><s%> at daybreak, <S%H1242><s%> while the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> were fleeing <S%H5127><s%> right <S%H7122><s%> into it; then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> overthrew <S%H5287><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the sea. <S%H3220><s%>

And the waters <S%H4325><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> and covered <S%H3680><s%> the chariots <S%H7393><s%> and the horsemen, <S%H6571><s%> even Pharaoh's entire <S%H3605><s%> army <S%H2428><s%> that had gone <S%H935><s%> into the sea <S%H3220><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them; not even <S%H5704><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of them remained. <S%H7604><s%>

But the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> walked <S%H1980><s%> on dry <S%H3004><s%> land <S%H3004><s%> through the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and the waters <S%H4325><s%> [were like] a wall <S%H2346><s%> to them on their right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> and on their left. <S%H8040><s%>

Thus the Lord <S%H3068><s%> saved <S%H3467><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> dead <S%H4191><s%> on the seashore. <S%H3220><s%> <S%H8193><s%>

And when Israel <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> power <S%H3027><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had used <S%H6213><s%> against the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> feared <S%H3372><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and they believed <S%H539><s%> in the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and in His servant <S%H5650><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
